ygData.subject: Re: What level for Invisibility?
ygData.msgSnippet: 16th level for wizards ... From: Ken Morrison [mailto:ken.morrison@mti.ca] Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 9:13 AM To: eq_wizards@onelist.com Subject: [eq_wizards]
ygData.messageBody:
16th level for wizards

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Morrison [mailto:ken.morrison@...]
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 9:13 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] What level for Invisibility?


Hi all, this is my first posting to this mail list, but i have read all the
archives.
Great info by the way, much better stuff here than other lists I have read..

To my point... At exactly what level do we Wizards have access to the
Invisibility Spell?

I have seen some postings which say 8th, but I am fairly sure every time I
have seen
it it says 16th level required !?!

Just confused is all because I am sure it said Level:16 on the spell...
Maybe I was looking at another Classes version of the spell???

Please help a befuddled Apprentice...I am desperately trying to get from
Qeynos to
Freeport to group with some RL friends and have already died trying to get
there...

Awaiting your collective wisdom with baited breath....

Alhassim,
4th Level Erudite Wizard of E'ci

P.S. - Does anyone on E'ci regularly make the trip from Qeynos to Freeport?
If so, please mention and I can keep an eye out for you and maybe tag along?
